translation_english: I was going / I used to go
example_sentence_italian: Io andavo al mare ogni estate.
example_sentence_english: I used to go to the sea every summer.
You often used to go to the market.

example_sentence_italian: Lui andava a scuola ogni giorno.
example_sentence_english: He used to go to school every day.
You (plural) used to go to Rome often.

example_sentence_italian: Loro andavano al cinema ogni sabato.
example_sentence_english: They used to go to the cinema every Saturday.
